The controlled ovarian stimulation protocol oocyte donor always calculate accord standard protocol Bernabeu Institute . Endometrial preparation carry follow standard protocol Bernabeu Institute follow : oestrogen administer transdermally patient maintain ovarian function undergo medical hypophysectomy depot GnRH agonists administer mid-luteal phase previous cycle . On day oocyte retrieval , patient randomise : Group A administer subcutaneous progesterone 25 mg/day ( Prolutex ) , Group B administer vaginal progesterone capsule 200 mg/3 time day ( Progeffik ) . The embryo transfer perform day 5 embryo culture ( Day +5 ) . A biochemical pregnancy test beta- hCG P4 analysis perform 14 day oocyte retrieval .
